techmeme.title: Turkey-based Good Job Games, which develops Match-3 games like the popular Match Villains, raised a $60M Series A, after raising a $23M seed six months ago (Cate Lawrence/Tech.eu)
Fleet management software provider Motive raises $150M led by Kleiner Perkins; the company reportedly could go public by the end of 2025 (Anthony Hughes/Bloomberg)
Stable, which is building a new Layer 1 blockchain for stablecoins, raised a $28M seed co-led by Bitfinex and Hack VC (Yogita Khatri/The Block)
Roblox reports Q2 revenue up 21% YoY to ~$1B, Bookings up 51% YoY to ~$1.4B, above $1.24B est., and DAUs up 41% YoY to 111.8M, above 106M est.; RBLX jumps 15%+ (Chris Eudaily/CNBC)
Profiles of OpenAI's heads of research Mark Chen and Jakub Pachocki, where they discuss the path toward more capable reasoning models and superalignment (Will Douglas Heaven/MIT Technology Review)
